## Getting Plankton net data



```{r setup}
library(forcis)
```




```{r 'import-data', eval=FALSE}
## Define the path to store data ----
path <- tempdir()

## Download and import data ----
nets <- get_plankton_nets_data(path)

## Explore dataset ----
dim(nets)

colnames(nets)
```
